mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cate_no AS "cateNo", a.cate_name AS "cateName", a.goods_no AS "goodsNo", a.goods_name AS "goodsName", a.goods_type AS "goodsType", a.goods_barcode AS "goodsBarcode", a.goods_status AS "goodsStatus", a.brand_name AS "brandName", a.larghezza AS "larghezza", a.style AS "style", a.material AS "material", a.specification AS "specification", a.price AS "price", a.cost_price AS "costPrice", a.main_urls AS "mainUrls", a.description AS "description", a.desc_pic AS "descPic", a.desc_pic_v AS "descPicV", a.qty AS "qty", a.sale_num AS "saleNum", a.sale_length AS "saleLength", a.label_type AS "labelType", a.eva_num AS "evaNum", a.good_eval_rate AS "goodEvalRate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods( cate_no, cate_name, goods_no, goods_name, goods_type, goods_barcode, goods_status, brand_name, larghezza, style, material, specification, price, cost_price, main_urls, description, desc_pic, desc_pic_v, qty, sale_num, sale_length, label_type, eva_num, good_eval_rate, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, merchant_id ) VALUES ( #{cateNo}, #{cateName}, #{goodsNo}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsType}, #{goodsBarcode}, #{goodsStatus}, #{brandName}, #{larghezza}, #{style}, #{material}, #{specification}, #{price}, #{costPrice}, #{mainUrls}, #{description}, #{descPic}, #{descPicV}, #{qty}, #{saleNum}, #{saleLength}, #{labelType}, #{evaNum}, #{goodEvalRate}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{merchantId} )

INSERT INTO goods
cate_no,
cate_name,
goods_no,
goods_name,
goods_type,
goods_barcode,
goods_status,
brand_name,
larghezza,
style,
material,
specification,
price,
cost_price,
main_urls,
description,
desc_pic,
desc_pic_v,
qty,
sale_num,
sale_length,
label_type,
eva_num,
good_eval_rate,
remarks,
create_by,
create_date,
update_by,
update_date,
del_flag,
merchant_id,

mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET cate_no = #{cateNo}, cate_name = #{cateName}, goods_no = #{goodsNo}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_type = #{goodsType}, goods_barcode = #{goodsBarcode}, goods_status = #{goodsStatus}, brand_name = #{brandName}, larghezza = #{larghezza}, style = #{style}, material = #{material}, specification = #{specification}, price = #{price}, cost_price = #{costPrice}, main_urls = #{mainUrls}, description = #{description}, desc_pic = #{descPic}, desc_pic_v = #{descPicV}, qty = #{qty}, sale_num = #{saleNum}, sale_length = #{saleLength}, label_type = #{labelType}, eva_num = #{evaNum}, good_eval_rate = #{goodEvalRate}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, merchant_id = #{merchantId} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE goods
cate_no = #{cateNo},
cate_name = #{cateName},
goods_no = #{goodsNo},
goods_name = #{goodsName},
goods_type = #{goodsType},
goods_barcode = #{goodsBarcode},
goods_status = #{goodsStatus},
brand_name = #{brandName},
larghezza = #{larghezza},
style = #{style},
material = #{material},
specification = #{specification},
price = #{price},
cost_price = #{costPrice},
main_urls = #{mainUrls},
description = #{description},
desc_pic = #{descPic},
desc_pic_v = #{descPicV},
qty = #{qty},
sale_num = #{saleNum},
sale_length = #{saleLength},
label_type = #{labelType},
eva_num = #{evaNum},
good_eval_rate = #{goodEvalRate},
remarks = #{remarks},
update_by = #{updateBy.id},
update_date = #{updateDate},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
WHERE id = #{id}
